mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_review (usercode, title, tourcode, content, registereddate) VALUES (#{usercode}, #{title}, #{tourcode}, #{content}, NOW())
INSERT INTO board_review_photo (reviewcode, photo, tourcode) VALUES (#{reviewcode}, #{photo}, #{tourcode})
mapper.select: SELECT tourcode FROM board_review WHERE reviewcode = #{reviewcode}
SELECT photo FROM board_review_photo WHERE reviewcode = #{reviewcode} ORDER BY reviewphotocode DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT nickname FROM member_table WHERE usercode = #{usercode}
